articles.description:
RT Daeshawn.sol
Sadly I was affected by the layoffs at @metaplex and find myself looking for my next Product Manager role.
Meaning I will no longer be leading the charge on the Metaplex SDKs, dev tools like Sugar, and documentation efforts alongside the most amazing engineers I've ever known.

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
RT Push Protocol | Push Chat Alpha is LIVE
The next generation of Push improvements is here! 👀🎉
Say hello to Push Improvement Proposals (or PIPs) - a transparent standard for proposing changes to the Push ecosystem that is entirely community-driven 👥
For the community, by the community! 🧵👇 https://push-protocol.medium.com/introducing-push-improvement-proposal-pip-702c44fc24f6

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
We're all about leveling up! This is a pretty exciting update from our S1 partners @ConsenSys
ConsenSys Diligence: Today we published the Diligence Security Tooling Guide to help devs across Web3 level up their smart contract security! 🥳🚀
 The guide features 22 tools from @GnosisDAO @trufflesuite @OpenZeppelin @TenderlyApp and more, and when to use each at every stage of development.👇
articles.title: We're all about leveling up! This is a pretty exciting update from our S1 partners @ConsenSys
